summary:
Fully Certified Master Powertex & Stone Art Trainer for Powertex. 

My first experience with Powertex was in 1998, this was after trying and testing all other comparable products in the market.  It is with no doubt that Powertex Textile Hardner is the best product available!

My tutor/mentor is Artist & Owner of Powertex, Brigitte Grade from Belgium.

Specialties: Making Sculptures,  with Powertex (Textile Hardner) & Powertex Stone Art.

And sell my artwork on many Markets

http://affordable-artwork.nl

treasury_media.title: Eva's Artwork 1 (62)
treasury_media.description: Lady Lilian made with, wire Alluminium foile tape and  the first nightdress from my Daughter.

projects.title: Powertex  and StoneArt  classes
projects.description:
What is Powertex:
Powertex is an environmentally friendly, non-toxic, highly versatile, water-based hardener that is used by artists and hobbyists worldwide. Powertex is compatible with paper, textile, leather, cardboard, fiberglass, wood, sand, Stone Art etc. Powertex will transform textiles into masterpieces. It is a remarkable adhesive. After being tested extensively for 6 months by crafters and artists.
Powertex is very easy to work on canvas to exhibit 3 dimensional works. When using Powertex Transparent and a piece of fabric with motives on, the motives will remain in the original shape. To colour Powertex Transparent is very easy, just add Powertex color pigment of your choice. Statues and designs made with Powertex can also be painted with oil paint or a varnish mixed with power color pigments.
Powertex is a liquid medium that is ready to be used straight from the container. Powertex can be brushed onto items or dipped directly into the product. Powertex remains flexible for quite a while (depending on temperature). Treated fabric can be draped, folded and manipulated into many different ways. Powertex takes about 2 weeks to cure although it will be dry to the touch within an hour or two.
Old T-Shirts, sheets, kiddy clothes and especially absorbent fabrics are excellent for Powertex. If you want to make a garden statue, no problem. Just varnish once dry and it will remain as is, for many years to come. Powertex has undergone extensive testing and has been awarded the AP Seal which means that it has been found to be 
non-toxic for adults and children.
Available in the following colors:
Bronze, Green, Yellow, Red, Lead, Terracotta, Dark Green, Ivory, Transparent, Black and Blue.
Examples of some of the beautiful pigments that can be mixed with Powertex transparent to create different colors.

contributors.headline: Vrijwilliger bij "Repaircafé in de Moerkoal" Middelrode-Berlicum

profile_positions.description:
I work in the housekeeping for our elderly, that today many have to endure due to restructuring of div Care practices and those at an age that they can no longer do this. Also because our elders continue to live at home longer.
It is very rewarding work and dealing with the elderly is so fun and interesting.
I hope to be able to sustain this for a long time with my clients that I have now, they are Treasures those oldies.
profile_positions.title: House Manager

profile_positions.description:
I am a master degree trainer At Powertex.
We make sculptures from resycled matirials and with T-shirts, armeture wire, tape and Alluminium foil and we make from this all a nice garden or indoor sculptures.

profile_positions.title: Powertex Master Trainer

profile_positions.description: Sometimes you (temporarily) need extra help in the household.  Pantein offers you that you need help with or without indication.  Our staff will help with household chores such as vacuuming, fabrics, window washing and bathroom cleaning.  Pantein has years of experience in providing domestic help in the region.  Our employees are committed and driven.  They make sure your house is clean and livable and make time for a chat.  Beforehand we discuss with you what help you need.  In this way we ensure proper alignment of aid on your personal situation.
profile_positions.title: Huishoudelijk werk

profile_positions.description:
Eva's workshops is an Art and Craft business in Berlicum where we conduct a variety of classes / workshops for young and old.  Classes you can sign up for are:

- Powertex Sculptures
- Powertex and Stone Art Painting
- Stone Art Scultures
- Powertex with Tyvek
- Powertex with Powerprint

For all Powertex and Powertex Stone Art we offer classes which are specially modified for beginners or advanced.  All classes / workshops can be held at any location (within the Netherlands) during any time and any day of the week.  Great fun for e.g. Friends party, Sister Party etc.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
From June 2004 - January 2008 my husband and I were the owners of Astonishing Crafts & Art in Australia.  In a relative short period of time we built a nation-wide dealer network with certified trainers selling and promoting our products which mainly consisted of the complete Powertex and Powertex Stone Art range.

In February 2008 we returned back to the Netherlands where I started a new business Eva's Krea Shop, the main activity is providing Craft & Art classes with Powertex and Powertex Stone Art. In 2008 I closed the shop and name, Now my name is Eva's Workshops and give only workshops.
profile_positions.title: Owner
